cRIO_timestamp.description: Time for the first sample of each telemetry item in this topic, as measured by the cRIO clock, as unix time.

nasmyth1CalculatedAngle.description: Nasmyth 1 axis position computed from the axis encoders, or nan if this axis is not in use. The range is the software limits (L1), approximately -175 to 175. Increasing the range requires installation of an additional switch.

nasmyth2CalculatedAngle.description: Nasmyth 2 axis position computed from the axis encoders, or nan if this axis is not in use. The range is the hard stop limits (L3), approximately -175 to 175. Increasing the range requires installation of an additional switch.

nasmyth1Encoder1Raw.description: Position (in encoder counts) reported by Nasmyth 1 rotator axis encoder 1.

nasmyth1Encoder2Raw.description: Position (in encoder counts) reported by Nasmyth 1 rotator axis encoder 2.

nasmyth1Encoder3Raw.description: Position (in encoder counts) reported by Nasmyth 1 rotator axis encoder 3.

nasmyth2Encoder1Raw.description: Position (in encoder counts) reported by Nasmyth 2 rotator axis encoder 1.

nasmyth2Encoder2Raw.description: Position (in encoder counts) reported by Nasmyth 2 rotator axis encoder 2.

nasmyth2Encoder3Raw.description: Position (in encoder counts) reported by Nasmyth 2 rotator axis encoder 3.

trackId.description: Unique identifier given by the ATPoining Component
